updateConfiguration.Description: update specific properties for the Software update configuration

scheduleInfo.Description: Schedule information for the Software update configuration

provisioningState.Description: Provisioning state for the software update configuration, which only appears in the response.

creationTime.Description: Creation time of the resource, which only appears in the response.

createdBy.Description: CreatedBy property, which only appears in the response.

lastModifiedTime.Description: Last time resource was modified, which only appears in the response.

lastModifiedBy.Description: LastModifiedBy property, which only appears in the response.

tasks.Description: Tasks information for the Software update configuration.

duration.Description: Maximum time allowed for the software update configuration run. Duration needs to be specified using the format PT[n]H[n]M[n]S as per ISO8601

azureVirtualMachines.Description: List of azure resource Ids for azure virtual machines targeted by the software update configuration.

nonAzureComputerNames.Description: List of names of non-azure machines targeted by the software update configuration.

targets.Description: Group targets for the software update configuration.

includedUpdateClassifications.Description: Update classification included in the software update configuration. A comma separated string with required values

excludedKbNumbers.Description: KB numbers excluded from the software update configuration.

includedKbNumbers.Description: KB numbers included from the software update configuration.

rebootSetting.Description: Reboot setting for the software update configuration.

includedPackageClassifications.Description: Update classifications included in the software update configuration.

excludedPackageNameMasks.Description: packages excluded from the software update configuration.

includedPackageNameMasks.Description: packages included from the software update configuration.

rebootSetting.Description: Reboot setting for the software update configuration.

azureQueries.Description: List of Azure queries in the software update configuration.

nonAzureQueries.Description: List of non Azure queries in the software update configuration.

scope.Description: List of Subscription or Resource Group ARM Ids.

locations.Description: List of locations to scope the query to.

tags.Description: Dictionary of tags with its list of values.

filterOperator.Description: Filter VMs by Any or All specified tags.

workspaceId.Description: Workspace Id for Log Analytics in which the saved Search is resided.

startTime.Description: Gets or sets the start time of the schedule.

startTimeOffsetMinutes.Description: Gets the start time's offset in minutes.

expiryTime.Description: Gets or sets the end time of the schedule.

expiryTimeOffsetMinutes.Description: Gets or sets the expiry time's offset in minutes.

isEnabled.Description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this schedule is enabled.

nextRun.Description: Gets or sets the next run time of the schedule.

nextRunOffsetMinutes.Description: Gets or sets the next run time's offset in minutes.

interval.Description: Gets or sets the interval of the schedule.

frequency.Description: Gets or sets the frequency of the schedule.

timeZone.Description: Gets or sets the time zone of the schedule.

advancedSchedule.Description: Gets or sets the advanced schedule.

creationTime.Description: Gets or sets the creation time.

lastModifiedTime.Description: Gets or sets the last modified time.

weekDays.Description: Days of the week that the job should execute on.

monthDays.Description: Days of the month that the job should execute on. Must be between 1 and 31.

monthlyOccurrences.Description: Occurrences of days within a month.

occurrence.Description: Occurrence of the week within the month. Must be between 1 and 5

day.Description: Day of the occurrence. Must be one of monday, tuesday, wednesday, thursday, friday, saturday, sunday.

message.Description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

parameters.Description: Gets or sets the parameters of the task.

source.Description: Gets or sets the name of the runbook.

properties.Description: The properties of the source control.

repoUrl.Description: The repo url of the source control.

branch.Description: The repo branch of the source control. Include branch as empty string for VsoTfvc.

folderPath.Description: The folder path of the source control. Path must be relative.

autoSync.Description: The auto async of the source control. Default is false.

publishRunbook.Description: The auto publish of the source control. Default is true.

sourceType.Description: The source type. Must be one of VsoGit, VsoTfvc, GitHub, case sensitive.

securityToken.Description: The authorization token for the repo of the source control.

description.Description: The user description of the source control.

tokenType.Description: The token type. Must be either PersonalAccessToken or Oauth.

properties.Description: The properties of the source control sync job.

commitId.Description: The commit id of the source control sync job. If not syncing to a commitId, enter an empty string.

sourceControlSyncJobId.Description: The source control sync job id.

creationTime.Description: The creation time of the job.

provisioningState.Description: The provisioning state of the job.

startTime.Description: The start time of the job.

endTime.Description: The end time of the job.

exception.Description: The exceptions that occurred while running the sync job.

properties.Description: Gets or sets the list of job properties.

parameters.Description: Gets or sets the parameters of the job.

runOn.Description: Gets or sets the runOn which specifies the group name where the job is to be executed.

startedBy.Description: Gets or sets the job started by.

jobId.Description: Gets or sets the id of the job.

creationTime.Description: Gets or sets the creation time of the job.

status.Description: Gets or sets the status of the job.

statusDetails.Description: Gets or sets the status details of the job.

startTime.Description: Gets or sets the start time of the job.

endTime.Description: Gets or sets the end time of the job.

exception.Description: Gets or sets the exception of the job.

lastModifiedTime.Description: Gets or sets the last modified time of the job.

lastStatusModifiedTime.Description: Gets or sets the last status modified time of the job.

provisioningState.Description: The current provisioning state of the job.

name.Description: Gets or sets the name of the runbook.
